abilities.desc: Shadow Fiend razes the ground directly in front of him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadowraze damage per stack. Each consecutive stack also decreases turn rate and movement speed.
abilities.name: Shadowraze
abilities.notes: Stack duration refreshes on stack gain.

abilities.desc: Shadow Fiend razes the ground a short distance away from him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadowraze damage per stack. Each consecutive stack also decreases turn rate and movement speed.
abilities.name: Shadowraze
abilities.notes: Stack duration refreshes on stack gain.

abilities.desc: Shadow Fiend razes the ground a longer distance away from him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadowraze damage per stack. Each consecutive stack also decreases turn rate and movement speed.
abilities.name: Shadowraze
abilities.notes: Stack duration refreshes on stack gain.

abilities.desc: Shadow Fiend steals the soul from units he kills, gaining bonus damage. On death, he releases 40% of them from bondage.
abilities.name: Necromastery
abilities.notes: Denies and neutral creeps also provide bonus damage through Necromastery.

abilities.desc: Shadow Fiend's presence reduces the armor of nearby enemies.
abilities.name: Presence of the Dark Lord
abilities.notes: Stacks fully with other armor reduction abilities and aura.

abilities.desc: Shadow Fiend gathers his captured souls to release them as lines of demonic energy. Units near Shadow Fiend when the souls are released can be damaged by several lines of energy. Any unit damaged by Requiem of Souls will be feared and have its movement speed and magic resistance reduced for 0.9 seconds for each line hit up to a maximum of 2.7. Lines of energy are created for every soul captured through Necromastery.  Requiem of Souls is automatically cast whenever Shadow Fiend dies, regardless of its cooldown.
abilities.name: Requiem of Souls
abilities.notes: Fear and movement slow do not apply when if the Requiem was released on death.
